sentences.en: All the things I would change if we could only rewind.
sentences.cn: 我愿改变一切，如果我们可以重回往昔。

sentences.en: Apply to full automatic transfer rewind, assure core don't slacken off.
sentences.cn: 适用于全自动装卸卷料的滑差轴, 保证正反转时卷芯不移位,不松动.

sentences.en: Before recording onto a new tape, wind it on fast forward, then rewind.
sentences.cn: 新带使用之前按快进键进带，然后倒带。

sentences.en: Before rewind film, turn the rewind knob.
sentences.cn: 要倒片时, 转动倒片钮.

sentences.en: But can't rewind time can't undo what it was done.
sentences.cn: 但是时光不能倒流.不可覆水能收.

sentences.en: Furthermore the built in cable rewind prevents tangling and prolongs cable life.
sentences.cn: 此外,在防止缠绕电缆退建,延长电缆使用寿命.

sentences.en: He switched the control to the answer-play mode and waited for the tape to rewind.
sentences.cn: 他把控制键转换到回答－播放模式，然后等待倒带。

sentences.en: I love audio tapes. The reason: I can rewind quickly.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢听录音带, 原因是录音带可以快速重放.

sentences.en: Please rewind the tape at the end of the film.
sentences.cn: 电影结束后请将盒带倒回.

sentences.en: Stop, pause, rewind, fast - forward as many times as you want.
sentences.cn: 你可以无数次的停止 、 暂停 、 重返 、 快进.

sentences.en: The automatic rewind isn't the most useful.
sentences.cn: 自动倒卷底片并不是最有用的.

sentences.en: To record, press these two buttons together; then rewind , and then press the red button to play back.
sentences.cn: 要录音就得一起按下这两个键, 而后倒回, 按下这个红键播放.

sentences.en: Wendy rewound the tape and played the message again.
sentences.cn: 温迪把录音带倒了回去，把那条留言又放了一遍。

sentences.en: Would you please rewind the thread onto the reel?
sentences.cn: 请你把这些线重新绕在线轴儿上好 吗 ?

sentences.en: You first must create the buffer, fill it, then rewind the position to the beginning so you can read from the start.
sentences.cn: 必须首先创建一个缓冲区，先填充它，然后将位置倒回起始点，这样才能从头读。

trans.tran_cn: 倒回（影片、录音带等），重绕
trans.tran_en: to make a  cassette  tape or  video  go backwards in order to see or hear it again
to make a  cassette  tape or  video  go backwards in order to see or hear it again
